metadata.name: Time Travel Debugging Utility Usage
metadata.comment: Detects usage of Time Travel Debugging Utility. Adversaries can execute malicious processes and dump processes, such as lsass.exe, via tttracer.exe.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\tttracer.exe')))

output.summary: Detects usage of Time Travel Debugging Utility. Adversaries can execute malicious processes and dump processes, such as lsass.exe, via tttracer.exe.

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate usage by software developers/testers References: https://lolbas-project.github.io/lolbas/Binaries/Tttracer/, https://twitter.com/mattifestation/status/1196390321783025666, https://twitter.com/oulusoyum/status/1191329746069655553
